Text:
if you ( everybody ) look at a torrent and it has no screenshots or link to boxcover/official info about the file  google it and copy and paste links to the info to help everyone else out ! please dont be lazy and expect the uploaders to do everything..do it yourself , the more people stop being selfish & expecting someone else to do this the better off well all be

It might have escaped you, but torrentday.com is subscribers only.

advert for other torrentsite that you cant open to see info about the file on without subscribing.

I will thank you for the upload, but advise to put in a resonable amount of info about future torrents :)

Info is for n00bs that don't know how to search, ffs you have the entire knowledge of the human race at your fingertips.  Figure it out kids.

Thanks TvTeam (bot?)
